attributes.action: stop the goverment getting pay rises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should the goverment get pay rises and good pensions for doing nothing much for the country , when nurses, firemen and the police get hardly anything when they save lifes and help people, and do a lot more for the UK

rejection.details: Are you referring to MPs? Nurses and so on are effectively "government" (ie. public sector) workers also.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
